controller.initial

Interface InitialWindowController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InitialWindowControllerImpl

    public interface InitialWindowController
    The InitialWindow controller.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addLevel(java.lang.String path)
      Tells the controller to load the level at the given path.
      void loadLevelSequence(java.lang.String path)
      Loads the level sequence from the file-system at the given path.
      void play()
      Tells the controller to start the playing of the current level sequence.
      void remove(int i)
      Tells the controller to remove the level with the given index from the current level sequence.
      void removeAll()
      Tells the controller to remove all of the elements of the current level sequence.
      void saveLevelSequence(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String path)
      Saves the current level sequence with the given name to the given path in the file-system.
      void swap(int i, int j)
      Tells the controller to swap the elements of the given indexes in the current level sequence.
      void toCraftLevelView()
      Tells the controller to go back to the craft level view.
      void updateLevelList()
      Tells the controller to sync the level list with the model level sequence.

    • Method Detail

      • addLevel

        void addLevel(java.lang.String path)
       throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
              LevelNotValidException,
              java.io.IOException
        Tells the controller to load the level at the given path.
        Parameters:
        path - the absolute path in the file-system from which to load the level to be added
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the loaded object is not recognized (e.g. level is corrupted)
        LevelNotValidException - if the level is not valid
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception has occurred.

      • swap

        void swap(int i,
          int j)
        Tells the controller to swap the elements of the given indexes in the current level sequence.
        Parameters:
        i - one index to be swapped
        j - the other index to be swapped

      • remove

        void remove(int i)
        Tells the controller to remove the level with the given index from the current level sequence.
        Parameters:
        i - the index of the element to be removed

      • removeAll

        void removeAll()
        Tells the controller to remove all of the elements of the current level sequence.

      • toCraftLevelView

        void toCraftLevelView()
        Tells the controller to go back to the craft level view.

      • play

        void play()
        Tells the controller to start the playing of the current level sequence.

      • updateLevelList

        void updateLevelList()
        Tells the controller to sync the level list with the model level sequence.

      • saveLevelSequence

        void saveLevelSequence(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String path)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the current level sequence with the given name to the given path in the file-system.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the level sequence
        path - the absolute path to which save the level sequence
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an input/output exception occurs

      • loadLevelSequence

        void loadLevelSequence(java.lang.String path)
                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Loads the level sequence from the file-system at the given path.
        Parameters:
        path - the path from which to load the level sequence in the file-system
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the loaded object is not recognized (e.g. a level is corrupted)
        java.io.IOException - if an input/output exception occurs
